scripts.build: cross-env react-scripts build || npm run sentry:sourcemaps
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: ./node_modules/.bin/sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org it-university-of-copenhagen --project zeeguu-web ./build && ./node_modules/.bin/sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org it-university-of-copenhagen --project zeeguu-web ./build
scripts.ext:updateZeeguuReact: cd extension && git submodule update --remote --merge && (cd src/zeeguu-react/ && npm install)
scripts.ext:installDepsWindows: cd extension && cd .\src\zeeguu-react && npm install && cd ..\..\. && mklink /d .\node_modules .\src\zeeguu-react\node_modules
scripts.ext:installDeps: cd extension && (cd src/zeeguu-react/ && npm install) && ln -s src/zeeguu-react/node_modules .
scripts.ext:buildDev: npm run ext:buildUnix:popup && npm run ext:build:content && npm run ext:build:bg && npm run ext:build:izo && cd extension && rm ./build/manifest.* && cp ./manifest.chrome.dev.json ./build/manifest.json
scripts.ext:buildWindows: cd extension && npm-run-all buildWindows:* && npm-run-all build:* && copy .\public\manifest.chrome.json .\build\manifest.json /Y
scripts.ext:buildWindowsDev: cd extension && npm-run-all buildWindows:* && npm-run-all build:* && copy .\public\manifest.chrome.dev.json .\build\manifest.json /Y
scripts.ext:pub: cd extension && zip -FSr build.zip build && open https://chrome.google.com/webstore/devconsole/7f6da896-c12c-4cb3-8ad7-b1641fc8efbc/ckncjmaednfephhbpeookmknhmjjodcd/edit/package
scripts.ext:buildFirefox: npm run ext:buildUnix:popup && npm run ext:build:content && npm run ext:build:bg && npm run ext:build:izo && cd extension && rm ./build/manifest.* && cp ./manifest.firefox.json ./build/manifest.json
scripts.ext:buildFirefoxDev: npm run ext:buildUnix:popup && npm run ext:build:content && npm run ext:build:bg && npm run ext:build:izo && cd extension && rm ./build/manifest.* && cp ./manifest.firefox.dev.json ./build/manifest.json
scripts.ext:buildFirefoxWindows: cd extension && npm-run-all buildWindows:* && npm-run-all build:* && copy .\public\manifest.firefox.json .\build\manifest.json /Y
scripts.ext:buildFirefoxWindowsDev: cd extension && npm-run-all buildWindows:* && npm-run-all build:* && copy .\public\manifest.firefox.dev.json .\build\manifest.json /Y
scripts.ext:pubFirefox: cd extension && (cd build && zip -FSr ../build.zip *) && npm-run-all zipSources && open https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/developers/addons
scripts.ext:pub-ci: cd extension && (cd src && git clone -b development https://github.com/zeeguu-ecosystem/zeeguu-react.git && cd zeeguu-react && npm ci) && cp ./public/manifest.chrome.json ./build/manifest.json && npm-run-all build:* && zip -FSr build.zip build
scripts.ext:pub-ci-firefox: cd extension && (cd src && git clone -b development https://github.com/zeeguu-ecosystem/zeeguu-react.git && cd zeeguu-react && npm ci) && npm run buildFirefox && zip -FSr build.zip build
scripts.ext:buildZipChrome: npm run ext:buildUnix:popup && mkdir -p extension/build/images && cd extension && cp ./public/index.html ./build/index.html && cp ./public/images/* ./build/images/ && cp ./manifest.chrome.json ./build/manifest.json && npm run ext:zip-build
scripts.ext:buildZipFirefox: npm run ext:buildFirefox && npm run ext:zip-build
